name: Flowers Game
description:
Your mission is to combine different flowers to complete levels.

You will need strategies to complete levels as fast front moves is missing, or choosing the best combinations to earn more points .

All these flowers could be yours , be fast and get all of them , do not leave a flower behind

Flowers Game features

- Easy to play
- Get hours of fun for free
- Train your brain to be quick and accurate when needed
- Align colored flowers as fast as you can and progress!
- Several levels
